{"blocks":[{"key":"5tk9v","text":"Dissolve one protease inhibitor tablet (Roche cOmplet mini) in  , then add Triton X-100 solution to   (e.g.   in  ) and  of sodium taurocholate to make active GCase buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":100,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":108,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":113,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":119,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"BC13E02A307A11EEBCEA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"M-buffer","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","concentration":"0.25","guid":"BC13E094307A11EEBCEA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","unit":206}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","concentration":"0.25","guid":"BC13E0F7307A11EEBCEA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","concentration":"0.25","guid":"BC13E155307A11EEBCEA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","concentration":"0.2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"BC13E1CA307A11EEBCEA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","unit":15}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7m2o7","text":"Set up the desired plate layout in a 384 well plate (flat bottom, black). There should be two sections, as each sample must be prepared and assayed both with and without CBE (CBE: GCase1 inhibitor).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a1tna","text":"Prepare   by diluting   in DMSO with the GCase buffer (GCase buffer:CBE = 92:8).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"0.8","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C412AC41307A11EEBCEA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"CBE","unit":28}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C412AC83307A11EEBCEA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"CBE","unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aci21","text":"Prepare CBE-free carrier solution in the same volume of GCase buffer/DMSO (GCase buffer:DMSO = 92:8).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2njmp","text":"Pipette   diluted with GCase buffer into wells of a 384- well plate. Four replication sets should be run (sample concentration:   ~  ). Protein concentration should be adjusted to be similar between control and experiment groups using GCase buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":128,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":132,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"CD6334D7307A11EEBCEA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"protein lysate","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","concentration":"0.7","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"CD633552307A11EEBCEA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","unit":204}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","concentration":"1.2","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"CD6335D1307A11EEBCEA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","unit":204}}}}
